properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 21 at 9:03PM PST until January 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...
- Small Craft Advisory conditions tonight; southwest winds 15 to
20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas 13 to 16 feet at 13
seconds.
- Gale conditions expected Wednesday; south winds 20 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 13 to 16 feet at 13 seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10
NM.

* WHEN...
- Small Craft Advisory in effect until 7 AM Wednesday.
- Gale Warning in effect from 7 AM until 4 PM Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY
